00063 __noreturn static inline void mainloop_run(struct workqueue *queue)
00064 {
00065         while (1) {
00066                 struct workqueue_task *task;
00067 
00068 #ifdef CONFIG_SOFTIRQ
00069                 assert(softirq_is_enabled());
00070 #endif
00071 
00072                 cpu_irq_disable();
00073 #ifdef CONFIG_SOFTIRQ
00074                 softirq_poll();
00075 #endif
00076                 task = workqueue_pop_task(queue);
00077                 if (task) {
00078                         cpu_irq_enable();
00079                         workqueue_run_task(task);
00080                 } else {
00081                         cpu_enter_sleep();
00082                 }
00083         }
00084 }

00087 
00088 #endif /* MAINLOOP_H_INCLUDED */
